text: Dana Vespoli is an American pornographic actress and movie director. Vespoli began performing at age 31 as a stripper. She began her pornographic career in 2003. In April 2006, Vespoli began directing for Digital Sin. Her directing work has focused mainly on lesbian scenes. In 2011, Complex named her thirteenth on their list of "The Top 50 Hottest Asian Porn Stars of All Time". Vespoli entered the AVN Hall of Fame in 2016. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American pornographic actors Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:AVN Award winners Category:Actors from New Hampshire Category:People from Hanover, New Hampshire
title: Dana Vespoli
